Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComputerBoard, HumanBoard
public interface Board
Board Interface class that has methods for the HumanBoard and ComputerBoard.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int attack​(int row, int col, Board other)
    Attack method, used by Human and Computer to attack other player's pieces.
    int getAddPiece()
    Returns addPiece var.
    position getPosition​(int x, int y)
    Gets specific location on the grid.
    position isValidPosition​(int x, int y)
    Checks if the entered position is within range.
    boolean positionValid​(int row, int col)
    Checks if the entered position is valid - only checks if user/computer is choosing an occupied grid.
    void setAddPiece​(int addPiece)
    Method to incrememnt the amount of pieces on both board.
    boolean setPiece​(int row, int col, java.lang.String Dir, GamePieces piece)
    Method to setPieces on the board for Human and Computer players.

  • Method Details

    • setPiece

      boolean setPiece​(int row, int col, java.lang.String Dir, GamePieces piece)
      Method to setPieces on the board for Human and Computer players.
      Parameters:
      row -
      col -
      Dir -
      piece -
      Returns:
      boolean. returns true if setting the piece was successful, false if the user/computer attempted invalid or out of range location.

    • attack

      int attack​(int row, int col, Board other)
      Attack method, used by Human and Computer to attack other player's pieces.
      Parameters:
      row -
      col -
      other -
      Returns:
      int. returns type of attack. 1 if hit, 2 if already guessed, 3 if missed, 0 if program failure.

    • positionValid

      boolean positionValid​(int row, int col)
      Checks if the entered position is valid - only checks if user/computer is choosing an occupied grid. No exception handling.
      Parameters:
      row -
      col -
      Returns:
      boolean. returns true if location is valid, else false

    • isValidPosition

      position isValidPosition​(int x, int y)
      Checks if the entered position is within range. Throws exception if out of range.
      Parameters:
      x -
      y -
      Returns:
      position. returns the specific grid at x and y.

    • getPosition

      position getPosition​(int x, int y)
      Gets specific location on the grid. Also used to increment and decrement grids for game pieces.
      Parameters:
      x -
      y -
      Returns:
      position. returns the specific grid at x and y.

    • setAddPiece

      void setAddPiece​(int addPiece)
      Method to incrememnt the amount of pieces on both board.
      Parameters:
      addPiece -

    • getAddPiece

      int getAddPiece()
      Returns addPiece var. Used to decide the winner when addPiece is 0.
      Returns:
